status.description: Adapter-defined status for the product as a whole

tags.description: Tags for categorization and filtering. Useful for organizing entities with custom labels (e.g., "priority", "wholesale", "gift")

options.description: Declares which option dimensions exist for the product

items.description: Definition for a selectable product option

name.description: Option dimension name, e.g. size or color

values.description: Optional merchandising hints for valid option values

imageURLs.description: Fallback imagery used when variants omit their own images

customFields.description: Custom Fields - allows for arbitrary key-value pairs to be added to an entity. Useful for storing any custom data that is not covered by the other fields.

id.description: Unique system-generated identifier for this entity (read-only)

externalId.description: ID of the entity in the client's system. Must be unique within the tenant.

createdAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the entity was created (read-only)

updatedAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the entity was last updated (read-only)

tenantId.description: Unique identifier for the tenant that owns this entity (read-only)
